meanings.sent1: She is the purtiest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden are the purtiest.
meanings.sent3: Everyone agreed that her dress was the purtiest at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sunset over the ocean was the purtiest painting nature could create.
meanings.sent5: The purtiest rainbow appeared after the rain, brightening up the sky.

meanings.sent1: The purtiest puppy found a loving home.
meanings.sent2: She wore the purtiest dress to the dance.
meanings.sent3: The purtiest sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the purtiest melody he had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The purtiest smile lit up her face, making everyone around her happy.

meanings.sent1: The purtiest flowers bloomed in the spring garden.
meanings.sent2: The purtiest view from the mountaintop took his breath away.
meanings.sent3: The purtiest cake at the party was gone in minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was the purtiest display at the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The purtiest colors of the sunset reflected on the calm lake.
